reuters.title: CIE BANCAIRE IN ONE-FOR-FIVE BONUS SHARE ISSUE
reuters.body: <Cie Bancaire>, a subsidiary of recently privatised banking group Cie Financiere de Paribas <PARI.PA>, said it is issuing 2.35 mln new 100 francs nominal shares on the basis of one for five already held. The operation will begin on March 31, a spokesman said. Cie Bancaire also said it has increased its capital to 1.41 billion francs from 1.17 billion by the incorporation of 237.74 mln francs of reserves. REUTER 
